1.text: Pick someone to shuffle and deal the cards for the first round.

2.text: Have the dealer shuffle and deal the cards out to each player.

3.text: Spread the rest of the cards out face-down in the middle of the table.

4.text: Let the person sitting to the left of the dealer go first.

5.text: Start your turn by asking one player if they have a specific card.

6.text: Give all your cards of a specific rank to the player if they’re in your hand.

7.text: Take another turn if you get the cards you asked for.

8.text: Tell the player to “go fish” if you don’t have the cards they’re asking for.

9.text: Pick up one card from the fishing pond whenever you have to “go fish.

10.text: Lay down 4-of-a-kind matches to get cards out of your hand.

11.text: Take another turn after laying down a match.

12.text: Win the game when you no longer have any cards in your hand.

13.text: End the game if the fishing pond is empty, even if no one has “won.
